bug.author: Frank-Dz
bug.description:
Before submitting a bug report, please be aware that your issue must be reproducible with all of the following, otherwise it is non-actionable, and we can not help you:
Current repo: run git fetch && git status -uno to check and git pull to update repo Common dataset: coco2017.data or coco64.data Common environment: Colab, Google Cloud, or Docker image. See https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3#reproduce-our-environment
If this is a custom dataset/training question you must include your train*.jpg, test*.jpg and results.png figures, or we can not help you. You can generate these with utils.plot_results(). <denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Input: <denchmark-code>import torch
a = torch.tensor([5]) c = a / 0 </denchmark-code>
Output: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/glennjocher/opt/anaconda3/envs/env1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/IPython/core/interactiveshell.py", line 3331, in run_code exec(code_obj, self.user_global_ns, self.user_ns) File "<ipython-input-5-be04c762b799>", line 5, in <module> c = a / 0 RuntimeError: ZeroDivisionError </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
OS: [e.g. Ubuntu] GPU [e.g. 2080 Ti]
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Frank-Dz>@Frank-Dz</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Ultralytics has open-sourced YOLOv5 at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5</denchmark-link> , featuring faster, lighter and more accurate object detection. YOLOv5 is recommended for all new projects.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26833433/90187293-6773ba00-dd6e-11ea-8f90-cd94afc0427f.png></denchmark-link>
To continue with this repo, please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom model or data training question, please note that Ultralytics does not provide free personal support. As a leader in vision ML and AI, we do offer professional consulting, from simple expert advice up to delivery of fully customized, end-to-end production solutions for our clients, such as:
Cloud-based AI systems operating on hundreds of HD video streams in realtime. Edge AI integrated into custom iOS and Android apps for realtime 30 FPS video inference. Custom data training, hyperparameter evolution, and model exportation to any destination.
For more information please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> .
